lines.text: Congratulations, Gene. You have knocked O.J. Simpson off of the front page!
Why am I the one who's going?
Because we don't know if they're a bunch of maniacs over there with Uzis waiting to blow away the first person to come to the door.
So, I'm the one who's expendable?
Unfortunately, Gene, yes. Because I'm the only one who knows how to work the dishwasher!
You know, when I put the band together, biting heads off chickens was not part of the original act.
You bite heads off of chickens?
Oh, no, no, no. The chicken thing was exaggerated. I mean, you know, we were already the bad boys of rock. We had the long hair and the makeup and the snake.
What snake?
Gene, do you have any idea who I am?
He's the best thing to happen to Stockbridge since Norman Rockwell.
Wow! It's not often that I get my name mentioned in the same breath as Norman Rockwell. Norman Bates....
Why are you so starstruck? In New York, we lived next door to the man who won the Nobel Prize in physics.
Yeah, but I didn't lose my virginity listening to one of his lectures on quantum theory!
Alice, would you do me one more little favor?
Sure, Gene. Us guys with girls' names have got to stick together.
(to Jack Travis) The most diffacult task is to raise a family.
avoiding taxes
(angry at being out smarted) Are you just here to state the obvious.
(still reading) No, I'm here to point out your obvious shortcomings.
Why don't I just get rid of him.
(Still reading) Because I figure out your Income Tax for free.
He's got you on a Technacality there Gene.
